plays.text: Penalty to Stephane Yelle 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jaroslav Bednar
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Chris Drury
Goal scored by Steve Reinprecht assisted by Martin Skoula and Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Cliff Ronning 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Rob Blake
Penalty to Joe Sakic 2 minutes for Tripping Cliff Ronning
Goal scored by Bryan Smolinski assisted by Cliff Ronning and Jaroslav Modry
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Jason Allison and Craig Johnson
Penalty to Adam Deadmarsh 2 minutes for Tripping Radim Vrbata
Goal scored by Joe Sakic assisted by Peter Forsberg and Chris Drury
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Adam Deadmarsh
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Mikko Eloranta
Goal scored by Greg de Vries assisted by Mike Keane and Eric Messier
